PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-03762017-04-13,  IRCC,  PS,  CBSA,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to permit foreign nationals from Brazil, Bulgaria and Romania to apply for an Electronic Travel Authorization for travel to Canada by air if they meet any of the following conditions: (1) have held a Canadian temporary resident visa at any time during the last 10 years prior to their application; or (2) at the time of application, hold a valid U.S. nonimmigrant visa.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0053 Publication Date: 2017-05-03
AttachmentsAttachment
